entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
